task.title: Configuring Email for Alerts
task.shortdesc: You can define the email addresses to receive metric and data alerts. When an alert triggers an email, the sends an email to every address in the list.

taskbody.prereq: email addressesconfiguring for alertsTo send email alerts, create an email account to send the alerts and define the SMTP properties in the sdc.properties file.

step.cmd: To view pipeline configuration options, click an unused section of the pipeline canvas.
In the Properties panel, click Email IDs.
Enter an email address where you want to send email alerts.
step.info: The email address receives every email alert generated by the pipeline.

step.cmd: To add additional email addresses, click the Add icon, and enter additional email addresses.
